title: Ultra Street Fighter IV version 1.09 + dlc's repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
Ultra Street Fighter IV + dlc's

Repack features:

Do not cut / recoded
Ripped: Nothing
Voice Language : English and Japanese
Game Version - 1.09
Precracked - install and play
Install Time - 13minutes [Quad Core]
Crack based on: RELOADED 
Final size: 10.9gb
Operating system: Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit aand 64bit)
Xbox 360 controller support: Yes

This is a standalone game, no other base game required to play this....
Previous hotfix patch has been applied....

DLC's included:

 Challengers Vacation Pack 2 (Juri, Adon, T. Hawk, Ibuki, Cody)
 Shadaloo Vacation Pack (M.Bison, Seth, Balrog, Vega, Sagat)
 Challengers Vacation Pack 1 (Hakan, Makoto, Guy, Dudley, Dee Jay)
 Shoryuken Vacation Pack (Ryu, Ken, Dan, Gouken, Akuma)
 Femme Fatale Vacation Pack (Chun-Li, C. Viper, Cammy, Rose, Sakura)
 2014 Challengers Vacation Pack (Poison, Elena, Hugo, Rolento, Decapre)
 Brawler Vacation Pack (Zangief, Rufus, E. Honda, El Fuerte, Abel)
 Arcade Challengers Vacation Pack (Oni, Evil Ryu, Yun, Yang)
 Classic Vacation Pack (Guile, Gen, Blanka, Fei Long, Dhalsim)

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

DISABLE UR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided)

After running setup,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, install as usual,, play the game from desktop shortcut....

For fullscreen, just press Left Alt + Enter ingame....

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......
